Interface WebSocketByteListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WebSocketListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultWebSocketListener

    public interface WebSocketByteListener
extends WebSocketListener
    A WebSocketListener for bytes

      Invoked when bytes of a fragmented message are available.

        void onFragment(byte[] fragment,
              boolean last)
        Invoked when bytes of a fragmented message are available.
        Parameters:

        last - if this fragment is the last in the series.
